n1.title: New Followers
n1.text: 300 to 700 New Followers per month. Boost your organic growth.

n3.title: More customers
n3.text: Turn your followers into loyal, paying customers.

n4.title: Track your results
n4.text: Between 2% to 5% increase in engagement rate. Monitor your actions and account statistics in real time.

n5.title: Simple integration
n5.text: Simple connection, with an interface designed to be automated and customized to your preferences.

n6.title: Security & compliance
n6.text: Secure Instagram account and protected data, fully GDPR compliant.

footer.clemence: Thanks to the tool, I finally structured my image: +400 new followers/month, more qualified DMs, and a feed that looks professional. I love it!
footer.ride: Our Reels are booming and the community is getting active. More engagement every week and real fans coming back to every post.
footer.shopnat: My Instagram finally took off: more customers in-store, stories being viewed, and messages every day. So easy to manage!
footer.becay: More consistent branding, UGC that performs, and a community that converts. Posts are becoming real sales drivers.
footer.mccall: Clear content calendar, zero hassle, and an audience that grows every week. I even landed new collaborations.
footer.tealer: Increased visibility, qualified traffic, and a more loyal community. You can feel the difference with every collection launch.
footer.utopia: Our events are reaching further: more views, more shares, and tickets selling faster thanks to Reels.

section1.title: General Subscription Terms
section1.p1: These General Subscription Terms bind the Provider and the Client upon subscription to the contract.
section1.p2: When the Client subscribes, they are invited to accept these General Subscription Terms.
section1.p3: It is recommended that the Client print or save them on their computer for future reference.
section1.p4: If the Client does not wish to be bound by these Terms, they must not accept them. Otherwise, they cannot subscribe.
section1.p5: If the Client does not accept the general sales terms and website usage terms at
section1.p6: Unless otherwise stated, these General Subscription Terms apply to subscription offers via the website.

section2.title: ARTICLE 2 – Informations légales
section2.p1: Le Client est tenu de prendre connaissance des présentes Conditions Générales d'Abonnement...
section2.p2: Le site internet présente les principales caractéristiques des services...
section2.p3: Le Client reconnaît qu'il est responsable de son abonnement...
section2.p4: Les coordonnées du Prestataire sont les suivantes :
section2.p5: Ces Conditions Générales d'Abonnement sont accessibles à tout moment...
section2.p6: Les Conditions Générales d'Abonnement ne concernent que le service LEZARD AGENCE...
section2.p7: Sauf preuve contraire, les données enregistrées dans le système...
section2.p8: Conformément à la Loi Informatique et Libertés...
section2.p9: Le Client dispose d'un droit d'accès, de rectification...
section2.p10: Le Client déclare avoir pris connaissance et accepté...

section3.title: ARTICLE 2 – Description of Services
section3.p1: The LEZARD AGENCE service is subscribed to primarily by the Client.
section3.p2: Additional or optional services may be added, requiring the subscription of specific options.
section3.p3: The Client has a 14-day withdrawal period from the date of contract conclusion, which they can exercise by sending the withdrawal form or any other unambiguous letter by registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt.
section3.p4: The Service will be accessible once this 14-day period has expired.
section3.p5: The Client may expressly request to benefit from the Service within 2 business days after payment.

section4.title: ARTICLE 4 – Payment Terms
section4.p1: Payment for services is made online using the secure payment methods available on the website.
section4.p2: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis according to the period chosen by the Client (monthly or yearly).
section4.p3: The Client agrees to maintain valid and up-to-date payment information throughout the subscription period.
section4.p4: In the event of payment failure or billing issues, access to services may be suspended until the issue is resolved.
section4.p5: Any price modifications will be communicated to the Client before application, with the possibility to cancel the subscription.
section4.p6: No refunds can be claimed outside of the legal withdrawal period.

section5.title: ARTICLE 5 – Subscription Activation
section5.p1: The day of the month when the Client subscribes online will automatically be defined as the contract's anniversary date.
section5.p2: Contractual information is presented in French and is confirmed at the latest at the time of subscription validation by the Client.
section5.p3: The Client has the ability to check the details of their subscription, its total price, and correct any errors before confirming acceptance (Article 1127-2 of the Civil Code).
section5.p4: This validation implies acceptance of the entirety of the General Subscription Terms as well as the General Terms of Sale and General Terms of Use of the website.
section5.p5: It is the Client's responsibility to verify the accuracy of the contract and immediately report any errors.
section5.p6: The Client's subscription will only be considered final after the confirmation of acceptance by the Provider via email and after full payment has been received.
section5.p7: Any subscription made on the website constitutes the formation of a remote contract between the Client and the Provider.
section5.p8: The Provider reserves the right to cancel or refuse any subscription from a Client with whom there is an ongoing dispute related to the payment of a previous contract.
section5.p9: The Client is solely responsible for the number of subscriptions they take out on the website. Subscribing to multiple subscriptions by the same Client does not constitute a valid reason for contract termination.

section6.title: ARTICLE 6 – Contract Renewal
section6.p1: The subscription contract is entered into for a fixed period of 1 month with automatic renewal for the same period.
section6.p2: According to Article L 215-1 of the Consumer Code, literally reproduced:
section6.p3: « For service contracts concluded for a fixed period with an automatic renewal clause, the service provider informs the consumer in writing...
section6.p4: If this information is not provided as required in the first paragraph, the consumer may terminate the contract free of charge...
section6.p5: Advance payments made after the last renewal date or, in the case of contracts of indefinite duration...
section6.p6: Under Article L 215-3 of the Consumer Code, the provisions of this chapter also apply to contracts concluded between professionals and non-professionals.

section7.title: ARTICLE 6.1 – Financial Terms
section7.tarif1: Premium Subscription: €269.99 incl. VAT/month (€224.99 excl. VAT)
section7.tarif2: Expert Subscription: €339.99 incl. VAT/month (€283.33 excl. VAT)
section7.tarif3: Premium Subscription (-20%): €214.99 incl. VAT/month (€179.99 excl. VAT)
section7.tarif4: Expert Subscription (-20%): €269.99 incl. VAT/month (€226.66 excl. VAT)
section7.tarif5: Premium Subscription (-30%): €189.99 incl. VAT/month (€158.33 excl. VAT)
section7.tarif6: Expert Subscription (-30%): €239.99 incl. VAT/month (€199.99 excl. VAT)
section7.p1: The Client may cancel their subscription at any time by contacting:
section7.p2: The Service Provider reserves the right to change its pricing. In such a case, the Client will be informed one month before the new prices take effect.
section7.p3: If the Client refuses a price increase applied to the LEZARD AGENCE service, they may cancel their subscription before the new prices take effect.
section7.p4: Invoices are issued monthly in advance and are payable on the date indicated on the invoice.
section7.payment2: Credit card via the approved payment provider Stripe
section7.p6: The 'Online Invoice' option is enabled by default upon subscription, unless explicitly requested otherwise by the Client.
section7.p7: The Client can request to view their invoices by sending an email to:
section7.p8: The Client agrees to notify the Service Provider of any change to their email address.
section7.p9: In the event of non-payment, the amounts due to the Service Provider will be subject to late payment interest, calculated from the date a formal notice is received.
section7.p10: If a Client's payment is declined, additional fees may be applied in accordance with Article 32 of the Law of July 9, 1991.
section7.p11: In the case of unpaid amounts, the Service Provider may:
section7.penalty1: Restrict access to the LEZARD AGENCE service
section7.penalty2: Suspend services linked to the Client's other accounts
section7.penalty3: Exercise its rights to recover unpaid amounts

section8.title: ARTICLE 6.2 – Provider's Obligations
section8.p1: The Provider undertakes to fulfill any subscription request within the limits of the IT system's capacity and service quality constraints.
section8.p2: It undertakes to make every effort to ensure the permanence, continuity, and quality of the service for which the subscription is taken out.
section8.p3: However, the Provider is only bound by an obligation of means and cannot be held responsible for technical issues such as:
section8.list3: Temporary suspension of service due to an action by the Client beyond the Provider's control (password change, failure to verify identity with the INSTAGRAM application…)
section8.p4: The Provider cannot be held responsible for discrepancies between the number of followers indicated in the offers and those actually received. The indicated follower counts are for informational purposes only and may vary due to external factors.
section8.p5: This list is not exhaustive. These services will be provided within a maximum of 48 hours from the final validation of the Client's subscription, in accordance with the provisions of these General Subscription Conditions.
section8.p6: If the ordered services have not been provided within 48 hours after the indicative delivery date, for any reason other than force majeure or the Client's fault, the contract may be terminated at the Client's written request.
section8.p7: The amounts paid by the Client will then be refunded within 14 days after the termination of the contract, without compensation or deduction.
section8.p8: Unless express reservations or claims are made by the Client upon receipt of the Services, they will be deemed to conform to the order in quantity and quality.
section8.p9: The Client has a period of 7 days from the provision of the Services to submit, in writing, any complaint with supporting documents to the Provider.
section8.p10: No claim will be validly accepted if the Client fails to comply with the deadlines and procedures.
section8.p11: The Provider will reimburse or correct the service as soon as possible and at its own expense, in accordance with the appropriate methods agreed upon by the Client, for any duly proven non-compliance.

section9.title: ARTICLE 7 – Client Obligations
section9.p1: Upon validation of the Client's subscription to the LEZARD AGENCE service, they will receive a username and password allowing them to access the service on the website.
section9.p2: It is important to note that, from the moment the contract is signed, the Client must provide their Instagram account login credentials. This information is essential to ensure the proper execution of the agreed services.
section9.p3: The Client agrees to use the subscribed offer in accordance with its intended purpose and the defined commercial terms.
section9.p4: The Client is prohibited from any commercial use of the website access provided to them.
section9.p5: Information and documents provided by the Provider may not be transferred or made available to any third party in any form.
section9.p6: Any fraudulent use of the website or any use contrary to these terms engages the Client’s personal liability.
section9.p7: In case of any modification to their banking details, addresses (postal or email), or any other essential information for the proper functioning of the service, the Client agrees to inform the Provider without delay and to update these details.
section9.p8: The Client agrees to comply with the laws and regulations in force.
section9.p9: The Provider expressly informs the Client that the Internet is not a secure network. Therefore, it is the Client’s responsibility to take all necessary measures to protect their data and software, both before and after the implementation of the services.
section9.p10: The Client agrees to comply with the terms and conditions of any software license used within the scope of the Service.
section9.p11: The Client also agrees to respect third-party intellectual property rights and obtain, if necessary, prior authorization for any protected content (texts, images, videos, sounds, etc.).
section9.p12: Furthermore, the Client acknowledges that the violation of copyright or related rights (e.g., reproduction, representation, or public communication of protected works) constitutes an act of counterfeiting, punishable by civil and/or criminal penalties.

section10.title: ARTICLE 8 – Suspension – Termination of the Contract
section10.p1: The Service Provider reserves the right to restrict access to all or part of the Services subscribed to by the Client, after notifying them, without the Client being entitled to any compensation, in the following cases:
section10.reason1: Failure to comply with any of the Client’s obligations
section10.reason2: Non-payment of due amounts by the deadline
section10.reason3: Violation of legal provisions, particularly those concerning public order and morality
section10.p2: In the event of a suspension, regardless of the cause, the Client remains bound by their obligations. The suspension of Services does not result in the suspension of billing.
section10.p3: Services may be interrupted in the event of force majeure.
section10.subtitle2: 8-2. Termination at the initiative of the Service Provider
section10.p4: The Service Provider may terminate the Client’s contract without compensation in the following cases:
section10.reason5: False statements by the Client regarding the contract
section10.reason6: Failure by the Client to fulfill their obligations
section10.reason7: Non-payment of due amounts following a formal notice that remains unaddressed
section10.reason8: Force majeure affecting the Service Provider for more than 15 days
section10.reason9: Judicial reorganization proceedings: If the court-appointed administrator explicitly or implicitly decides not to continue the contract, or in the event of a court-ordered liquidation.
section10.reason10: Fraudulent creation of a new account: if the Client creates a new account using another email address and links an Instagram account already used to benefit again from the 5-day free trial, they will be automatically charged. The free trial is valid for only one unique Instagram account. The Service Provider reserves the right to charge any attempt to bypass this rule.
section10.reason11: Early termination of a contractual commitment: in the case of a subscription with a 3 or 6-month commitment, if the Client voluntarily terminates the contract before the end of the term, they will be required to pay 70% of the remaining amount due. In case of non-payment, the Service Provider reserves the right to take legal action.
section10.p5: Termination of the contract for any of the above-mentioned reasons may only occur 30 days after receipt of a formal notice stating the intention to invoke this clause. This notification shall be sent by registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt or by any extrajudicial means.

section11.title: ARTICLE 9 – Personal Data (DCP)
section11.p1: Pursuant to Law 78-17 of January 6, 1978, as amended by Law No. 2018-493 of June 20, 2018, it is reminded that the personal data requested from the Client is necessary for processing their subscription contract and issuing invoices.
section11.p2: The Provider takes appropriate measures to ensure the protection and confidentiality of the DCP in its possession concerning Clients and processes it in accordance with the provisions of Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978, as amended, relating to computing, files, and freedoms, as well as the applicable European regulations on personal data protection.
section11.p3: The processing of information communicated via the website meets legal requirements regarding personal data protection. The information system used ensures optimal protection of this data.
section11.p4: The data controller for the DCP is LEZARD AGENCE, whose registered office is:
section11.p5: DCP is collected by the Provider in connection with the Client's subscription and use of services.
section11.p6: The processing of DCP is intended for:
section11.purpose1: Managing the Client's account (preventing unpaid amounts, combating fraud)
section11.purpose4: Managing pre-litigation, litigation, and unpaid amounts
section11.purpose5: Managing the rights of individuals and their requests
section11.purpose6: Providing and ensuring the proper functioning of the Service
section11.purpose9: Conducting statistical studies, analysis, and audience measurement
section11.purpose10: Enriching and enhancing the customer database
section11.purpose11: Communicating with the Client about the Services
section11.retention2: The specific duration for the processing to which the Client has consented
section11.recipient2: Subcontractors, partners, or service providers of LEZARD AGENCE
section11.p9: If these entities are located outside the European Union, they must:
section11.transfer1: Be subject to an adequacy decision by the European Commission
section11.p10: A copy of these documents can be obtained from the Provider.
section11.p11: The Client may exercise their rights at any time:
section11.rights1: Access, modification, rectification, and deletion of their DCP
section11.p12: The Client may submit a request by mail, providing their full name, phone number, and a copy of their ID.
section11.p13: The Client may file a complaint with the CNIL in case of a violation of their rights.

section12.title: ARTICLE 10 – Intellectual Property
section12.subtitle: Intellectual Property
section12.p2: is the exclusive property of the Provider and its partners. It is protected by French and international laws on intellectual property.
section12.p3: Any total or partial reproduction of this content is strictly prohibited and may constitute an act of counterfeiting.
section12.p4: Furthermore, the Provider retains all intellectual property rights over the following elements, whether created on its own initiative or at the Client's request:
section12.p5: The Client is therefore prohibited from reproducing or exploiting these elements without the express written authorization of the Provider. This authorization may be subject to financial compensation.

section13.title: ARTICLE 11 – Complaints
section13.subtitle: Complaints
section13.p1: Any complaint must be submitted exclusively via the live chat, available in the 'Support' section of the client area on the website:
section13.p2: No complaints will be accepted if submitted by any other means, including:

section14.title: ARTICLE 12 – Applicable Law – Language
section14.p1: These General Subscription Terms and the resulting operations are governed by and subject to French law.
section14.p2: These conditions are written in French. In case of translation into one or more foreign languages, only the French text shall be legally binding in case of a dispute.

section15.title: ARTICLE 13 – Disputes
section15.p1: All disputes arising from the application of these General Subscription Terms, concerning their validity, interpretation, execution, termination, and their consequences, which could not be resolved amicably between the Provider and the Client, will be submitted to the competent courts under French law.
section15.p2: The Client is informed that they may resort to conventional mediation, particularly with:
section15.reason1: The Consumer Mediation Commission (Article L 612-1 of the Consumer Code)
section15.reason2: Existing sectoral mediation bodies, whose references are available on the website
section15.reason3: Any other alternative dispute resolution method in case of disagreement
section15.p3: In case of a violation of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Client may:
section15.gdpr1: Mandate an association or a specialized organization mentioned in IV of Article 43 ter of the Data Protection and Freedom Law of 1978
section15.gdpr2: Initiate proceedings against the data controller or the processor before a civil or administrative court
section15.gdpr3: Directly file a complaint with the National Commission on Informatics and Liberties (CNIL)

section1.title: Data Protection
section1.p1: Lezard Agency places great importance on the protection of personal data and the respect of the privacy of anyone accessing our digital ecosystem.
section1.p2: This page describes the types of personal data that Lezard Agency may collect about visitors to our website, as well as how we and our subcontractors may use it and for what purposes.
section1.p3: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter 'Policy') also provides important information about your rights and how your personal data is protected.
section1.p4: All operations on your personal data are carried out in compliance with the applicable regulations, including:

list.item1: The European Regulation No. 2016/679 of April 27, 2016 (GDPR)
list.item2: Law No. 78-17 'Informatics and Liberties' of January 6, 1978, as amended

section1.p5: By continuing to browse our website (hereinafter 'site'), you acknowledge that you have read and accepted this Policy, as well as the general terms of use of our site.

section2.title: Who collects personal data (identity of the data controller)?
section2.p1: This website is managed by Lezard Agency
section2.p2: Lezard Agency is registered under the SIREN number in the commercial and companies register [city or region].
section2.p3: Lezard Agency has appointed a Data Protection Officer (DPO), whom you can contact by email at:

section3.title: What personal data is collected?
section3.p1: The term 'personal data' refers to any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person, directly or indirectly.
section3.p2: The personal data collected by Lezard Agency includes information about you that allows us to identify you, such as:

data2.title: Connection data:
data2.item5: Information about the devices used to access the website

section3.p3: For any other data collected, the data collection form will provide information on the applicable rules for the specific data collected, insofar as they differ from those set out in this Privacy Policy.

section4.title: When do we collect personal data?
section4.p1: collects your personal data explicitly and transparently, through informational notices or references to this Privacy Policy.
section4.p2: Your personal data may be collected in the following situations:

list.item2: When you fill out a form or leave a comment on our site
list.item3: When you request to receive documentation or information about our services
list.item4: When you communicate with us via email, phone, social media, or any other means
list.item5: When you apply for a job
list.item6: When you report a problem or request assistance

section4.p3: Some requested personal data is mandatory. The mandatory nature of the data is indicated by an asterisk (*).
section4.p4: If you do not provide the required data, this may result in the inability to access certain services on the site.

section5.title: For what purposes are personal data collected?
section5.subtitle: 📜 Legal basis for processing
section5.p1: The collection and processing of your personal data are carried out for specific purposes, which are specified at the time of collection.

list.item1: Only collecting personal data for specific, explicit, and legitimate purposes.
list.item2: Not processing these data in a manner incompatible with these purposes.
list.item3: Processing only data that is adequate, relevant, and limited to what is necessary.

section5.p3: The main legal bases for data processing by Lezard Agency are:

contract.title: Contract execution
contract.description: When processing is necessary for the execution of the contract between you and Lezard Agency, for example, managing your quote request, providing services, or tracking your order.

legalObligations.title: Legal obligations
legalObligations.description: When processing is necessary to comply with legal or regulatory obligations, such as tax declarations or anti-money laundering regulations.

legitimateInterest.title: Legitimate interests
legitimateInterest.description: When processing is necessary for the legitimate interests of Lezard Agency, such as:

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: When processing is based on your consent, for example, for sending marketing communications. You can withdraw your consent at any time by changing your preferences in emails or on our website.

section6.title: Recipients of Personal Data
section6.subtitle: 🔒 Confidentiality Commitment
section6.p1: Lezard Agency commits not to sell, rent, or transfer your personal data to third parties without your prior and explicit consent.
section6.p2: However, we may share your personal data with other entities in the following cases:

staff.title: 👥 Authorized Staff of Lezard Agency
staff.description: Members of our team, within the framework of performing tasks related to the purposes described previously.

providers.title: 🛠️ Our Service Providers and Subcontractors
providers.description: Lezard Agency may use third-party providers to process your data, particularly for:

list.item4: Operating the services offered on the site

partners.title: 🤝 Commercial Partners of Lezard Agency
partners.description: Subject to your express and prior consent, we may share your data with selected business partners so they can offer you special deals or advertisements.

legal.title: ⚖️ Legal Representatives and Court Officials
legal.description: In case of a dispute, we may share your data with lawyers, bailiffs, or other legal professionals for litigation management and debt recovery.

government.title: 🏛️ Public Authorities
government.description: We may transmit your data to administrative authorities (tax, social, etc.) to comply with legal obligations and in case of a state audit.

ads.title: 📢 Advertising Networks and Social Media
ads.description: Some of your data may be shared with advertising networks or social platforms to offer you targeted advertisements.

seo.title: 🔎 Search Engine Providers
seo.description: As part of optimizing our website, we may share your data with service providers specializing in search engine optimization and visibility improvement.

consent.title: ✅ Express Consent
consent.description: Your data will only be shared with third parties if you have given your consent, for example, for joint marketing campaigns.

sale.title: 💰 Asset Transfer
sale.description: If Lezard Agency or part of its assets were to be sold or transferred, your data could be shared with the potential acquirer as part of this transaction.

section7.title: Retention period of personal data
section7.subtitle: 📁 Data Retention
section7.p1: will retain your personal data in a secure environment for the necessary duration to achieve the purposes for which they were collected, in accordance with:

dataRetention1.title: Data for marketing and commercial purposes
dataRetention1.description: Stored for 3 years after the last contact initiated by the client or the end of the contractual relationship.

dataRetention2.title: Data related to contract management and associated services
dataRetention2.description: Stored for the entire duration of the contract and until the expiration of the applicable legal limitation periods.

section8.title: Security and Confidentiality
section8.subtitle: 🔐 Data Security and Confidentiality
section8.p1: takes appropriate measures to ensure the confidentiality and security of your personal data, preventing any unauthorized access, damage, or deletion of data.
section8.protection1: Login and password protection to secure access
section8.protection2: Limited access to authorized personnel only (employees, contractors), who are bound by a confidentiality obligation
section8.subtitle3: In case of a data breach
section8.alert1: Notify the competent supervisory authority (such as the CNIL)
section8.alert2: Inform you as soon as possible if the breach presents a high risk to your rights and freedoms
section8.alert3: Allow you to take appropriate measures to protect your data

section9.title: Your Rights
section9.subtitle: 📜 Your Rights Regarding Your Personal Data
section9.p1: In accordance with current legislation, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Access
access.description: You can request to view the data we hold about you.

modification.title: Modification
modification.description: You have the right to request the correction of inaccurate information.

deletion.title: Erasure
deletion.description: You can request the deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten').

restriction.title: Restriction
restriction.description: You can restrict the processing of your data under certain conditions.

portability.title: Portability
portability.description: You have the right to receive your data in a structured and machine-readable format

opposition.title: Objection
opposition.description: For legitimate reasons, you can object to the processing of your personal data.

consent.title: Withdrawal of Consent
consent.description: If processing is based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw it at any time.

section9.p2: 📩 You can also file a complaint with the
section9.p3: or any other competent data protection authority in the European Union.
section9.p4: 📝 Finally, you have the option to define instructions regarding the processing of your data after your death.

section10.title: Commercial Prospecting
section10.p1: Regarding commercial prospecting, you can at any time object to receiving communications by clicking on the unsubscribe link included in the emails or by accessing your customer area.

section11.title: Protection of Minors' Data
section11.p1: The Lezard Agency website is generally not intended for minors under the age of 15. If a minor has provided personal data, they must ensure they have obtained prior authorization from a parent or legal guardian. Lezard Agency disclaims any responsibility in case of data transmission without this authorization. We encourage parents and guardians to monitor their children's Internet usage and guide them towards responsible behavior.

section12.title: Cookies
section12.p1: During your visits to the Lezard Agency website, cookies may be placed on your computer, tablet, or smartphone, subject to your prior, explicit, and specific consent.

section13.title: Consent
section13.subtitle: 🍪 Cookie Management
section13.p1: From your first visit to our site, a banner informs you of the presence of cookies and invites you to express your choice. Your consent is collected through this banner.
section13.option1: Accept: Cookies will be stored if you continue browsing.
section13.option2: Reject: You can refuse them via the section
section13.info1: Access clear information on the purposes of the cookies used.
section13.info2: Manage your consent by clicking on the link in the site menu.
section13.info3: Modify or delete cookies via your browser settings.
section13.warning: Warning: Refusing certain cookies may limit access to some site functionalities.
section13.p3: Lezard Agency cannot be held responsible for malfunctions related to the deactivation of cookies, and this will not result in any compensation.

section14.title: Links to Third-Party Websites
section14.p1: The Lezard Agency website may contain links to third-party websites. We have no control over these sites and disclaim any responsibility for their content and use of your personal data. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of each third-party site.

section15.title: Changes to the Policy
section15.p1: Lezard Agency reserves the right to modify this Cookie Policy at any time. Any changes will be published on the website and will take effect immediately. We encourage you to check this page regularly to stay informed of updates.

section16.title: Contact
section16.p1: For any questions or comments regarding this Policy, you can contact us at:

section1.title: Terms of Use
section1.subtitle: Introduction
section1.p1: Welcome to the website of Lezard Agency (
section1.p2: ). By accessing and using our Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use (the "Terms"). Please read them carefully before using our Website.

section2.subtitle: Access to the Website
section2.p1: Access to the Website is free. However, some services or features may be subject to specific fees. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, access to all or part of the Website, with or without notice.

section3.subtitle: Use of the Website
section3.p1: You agree to use the Website legally and to comply with applicable laws and regulations. You agree not to:

list.item1: Use the Website for fraudulent or illegal purposes.
list.item2: Upload, post, email, or otherwise transmit any illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, or otherwise objectionable content.
list.item3: Transmit any content that may infringe the intellectual property rights of third parties.

section4.subtitle: Intellectual Property
section4.p1: All content on the Website, including but not limited to texts, images, graphics, logos, icons, and software, is the exclusive property of Lezard Agency or its partners and is protected by intellectual property laws. You are not allowed to reproduce, distribute, modify, or exploit this content without our prior written authorization.

section5.subtitle: Links to Third-Party Websites
section5.p1: The Website may contain links to third-party websites. These links are provided for your convenience only. We have no control over these sites and are not responsible for their content or privacy policy. Access to these sites is at your own risk.

section6.subtitle: Liability
section6.p1: Lezard Agency shall not be held liable for direct or indirect damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, clientele, data, or other intangible losses resulting from the use or inability to use the Website. We do not guarantee that the Website will be free of errors or interruptions.

section7.subtitle: Modification of Terms
section7.p1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. The modifications will take effect as soon as they are published on the Website. It is your responsibility to regularly check the Terms to stay informed of any updates. Your continued use of the Website after the publication of changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

section8.subtitle: Applicable Law
section8.p1: These Terms are governed and interpreted in accordance with French law. Any dispute related to the execution or interpretation of these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the competent courts in France.

section9.subtitle: Contact
section9.p1: For any questions regarding these Terms of Use, please contact us:

contact.title: Any questions?
contact.subtitle: Book your 20-min consultation with our expert!

contact.title: Any questions?
contact.subtitle: Book your 20-min consultation with our expert!

items.question: Is my account at risk of being banned or shadowbanned?
items.answer: None of our clients have ever been banned because of our service. Since 2017, we have developed an advanced algorithm that simulates natural human behavior, with secure connections from an iPhone and an IP address, which prevents any detection by Instagram. In addition, our security processes are designed to protect your account by respecting Instagram’s limits. Rather than causing a shadowban, our technology helps improve your engagement and strengthen your visibility organically.

items.question: How many followers can I expect to gain?
items.answer: The number of followers you can gain depends on several factors, including the quality and frequency of your content as well as the attractiveness of your branding. Our users generally see steady growth thanks to our precise targeting and the engagement of acquired followers. We do not promise exact numbers, as growth varies from account to account. However, our methods ensure that only qualified followers interested in your content will follow you, guaranteeing a relevant and engaged audience.

items.question: Are the followers real and engaged?
items.answer: Yes, absolutely! We do not sell fake followers or artificial interactions. Our technology only selects active profiles interested in your niche, by analyzing your competitors’ followers and the most engaged users. Unlike services that artificially inflate follower counts, we focus on authentic, natural growth. This not only helps you attract a quality audience but also improves your engagement rate in the long term.

items.question: Can I use the service for multiple accounts?
items.answer: Yes, our plans are flexible and can be adapted for multiple accounts. If you want to manage several Instagram accounts with our solution, we offer preferential rates for multi-account subscriptions. Each account benefits from optimized settings based on its niche and target audience. Contact us to discuss the best options for your needs.

items.question: Will you send messages or comment on my behalf?
items.answer: Unless you set up a welcome message for your new followers, we will not comment or send messages on your behalf. Our actions focus on natural and effective interactions, such as targeted follows, post/story likes, and story views. This attracts interested followers without hurting their user experience on Instagram.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription easily?
items.answer: Yes, you are free to cancel your subscription at any time. Our subscriptions work on a monthly basis, and you will not be charged for the following period once the cancellation is complete. We believe in transparency and flexibility. Our goal is to provide you with a high-quality service with no binding commitment, so you can use our solution with peace of mind. The same applies to our free trial offer, which is truly free.
